trans-unit.source: Represents a directory object in a virtual file or resource space.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto de diretório num espaço de ficheiro ou recurso virtual.

trans-unit.source: The VirtualDirectory class is the base class for objects that represent directories in a virtual file system.
trans-unit.target: A classe de VirtualDirectory é a classe base para objetos que representam os diretórios num sistema de ficheiros virtual.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would implement a descendent of the VirtualDirectory class for each <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider> class descendent in your Web application.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, deverá implementar descende da classe VirtualDirectory para cada <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>classe descendente na sua aplicação Web.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the resource represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: O caminho virtual para o recurso representado por esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the files and subdirectories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista dos ficheiros e subdiretórios contidos neste diretório virtual.

trans-unit.source: The Children property contains both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects that represent the files and directories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de elementos subordinados contém os <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos que representam os ficheiros e diretórios contidos neste diretório virtual.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return only the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver apenas a <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return only the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver apenas a <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém a interface <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all the subdirectories contained in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de todos os subdiretórios contidos neste diretório.

trans-unit.source: The Directories property contains <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects that represent the directories contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: Contém a propriedade de diretórios <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos que representam os diretórios contidos neste diretório virtual.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: To return the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Files%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver ambos <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém a interface <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all files contained in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista de todos os ficheiros contidos neste diretório.

trans-unit.source: The Files property contains <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> objects that represent the files contained in this virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ficheiros contém <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>objetos que representam os ficheiros contidos neste diretório virtual.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: To return the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Directories%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>

trans-unit.source: To return both <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile> and <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver ambos <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>e <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory.Children%2A> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualDirectory> </xref:System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que contém a interface <xref href="System.Web.Hosting.VirtualFile"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates that this is a virtual resource that should be treated as a directory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica que se trata de um recurso virtual que vai ser tratado como um diretório.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
